description: Recently redundant software tester, applying for Universal Credit

communicationStyle.techSavvy: High - former software tester, comfortable with digital services
primaryConcerns: Getting financial support while job hunting
Understanding what she needs to do and when
Making sure she provides everything correctly the first time
typicalPhrases: I was made redundant at the end of January, so I need to apply for UC
I've got all my documents ready, just tell me what you need
Sorry, can you explain what that means exactly?
Is there anything else I should know about?
